app module

Module providing the entry point to our HexTool application.

app.home()

Home page of the HexTool application.

division_method_hasher module

Adds the remainder of a modulus to a 64 bit hash, for each byte in the input.

class division_method_hasher.DivisionMethodHasher

Bases: Hasher

Concrete implementation of the Abstract Hasher class that takes the modulus of each byte k by M and adds the remainder to a 64 bit hash.

hash(raw_bytes: bytes) → Hash

Calculates the hash by taking the modulus of each byte and adding it to a 64-bit hash.

Args:

raw_bytes (bytes): Array of bytes of the input.

Returns:

The hash of the input bytes.

hash_64_bit module

Interprets an item as a 64-bit hash.

class hash_64_bit.Hash64Bit(item: any)

Bases: Hash

Concrete Hash Class which interprets an input as a 64-bit hash.

fnv1a_64bit_hash()

Concrete Hash Class which interprets an input as a 64-bit hash.

Returns:

Hash String

to_hash_string() → str

Converts item to hash string.

Returns:

Hash String

hash module

Abstract Hash Class giving the definition of how a Hash behaves.

class hash.Hash(item: any)

Bases: ABC

Converts the hash produces by the hasher in a particular bit format.

abstract to_hash_string() → str

Abstract method to that determines how a hash is interpreted.

hex_tool module

Hashing method factory that allows for easy switching of Hashing Methods.

Bases: object

Hashing method factory.
